events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under Refund since the customer is requesting a return and refund.
An available customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your jacket and get a refund. I'm here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the product is unused and in original packaging?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and I still have the original tags and packaging intact.
Thank you for the info. You can send the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label Iâ€™m sending you now. Once we receive the item, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and the prepaid label. I will send it back today and expect the refund soon.
Glad I could assist! Your case is now resolved. We will notify you once your refund is processed after the return is received.
Just checking in to confirm we received your returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully.
Your refund case is now closed. Please reach out if you need any further assistance in the future.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey. We would appreciate your feedback on our support and handling of your refund request.
